summary: Okay but
body:
Okay but

What made JK Rowling decide to turn Draco into a ferret?? Why a ferret specifically?? Why not like… a goldfish?? Or a mole-rat??

reblog.comment:

What made JK Rowling decide to turn Draco into a ferret?? Why a ferret specifically?? Why not like… a goldfish?? Or a mole-rat??

trail.content_raw:

trail.content:
Okay but

What made JK Rowling decide to turn Draco into a ferret?? Why a ferret specifically?? Why not like… a goldfish?? Or a mole-rat??

tags: harry potter and the half blood prince
summary: "At once, Katie rose into the air, not as Ron had done, suspended comically by the ankle, but gracefully, her arms outstretched,...
caption: “At once, Katie rose into the air, not as Ron had done, suspended comically by the ankle, but gracefully, her arms outstretched, as though she was about to fly. Yet there was something wrong, something eerie… Her hair was whipped around her by the fierce wind, but her eyes were closed and her face was quite empty of expression. Harry, Ron, Hermione, and Leanne had all halted in their tracks. Then, six feet above the ground, Katie let out a terrible scream. Her eyes flew open but whatever she could see, or whatever she was feeling, was clearly causing her terrible anguish. She screamed and screamed; Leanne started screaming too and seized Katie’s ankles, trying to tug her back to the ground. Harry, Ron and Hermione rushed forward to help.”

reblog.comment: “At once, Katie rose into the air, not as Ron had done, suspended comically by the ankle, but gracefully, her arms outstretched, as though she was about to fly. Harry, Ron, Hermione, and Leanne had all halted in their tracks. Then, six feet above the ground, Katie let out a terrible scream. Her eyes flew open but whatever she could see, or whatever she was feeling, was clearly causing her terrible anguish. She screamed and screamed; Leanne started screaming too and seized Katie’s ankles, trying to tug her back to the ground. Harry, Ron and Hermione rushed forward to help.”

trail.content_raw: “At once, Katie rose into the air, not as Ron had done, suspended comically by the ankle, but gracefully, her arms outstretched, as though she was about to fly. Yet there was something wrong, something eerie… Her hair was whipped around her by the fierce wind, but her eyes were closed and her face was quite empty of expression. Harry, Ron, Hermione, and Leanne had all halted in their tracks. Then, six feet above the ground, Katie let out a terrible scream. Her eyes flew open but whatever she could see, or whatever she was feeling, was clearly causing her terrible anguish. She screamed and screamed; Leanne started screaming too and seized Katie’s ankles, trying to tug her back to the ground. Harry, Ron and Hermione rushed forward to help.”

Yet there was something wrong, something eerie… Her hair was whipped around her by the fierce wind, but her eyes were closed and her face was quite empty of expression. Harry, Ron, Hermione, and Leanne had all halted in their tracks. Then, six feet above the ground, Katie let out a terrible scream. Her eyes flew open but whatever she could see, or whatever she was feeling, was clearly causing her terrible anguish. She screamed and screamed; Leanne started screaming too and seized Katie’s ankles, trying to tug her back to the ground. Harry, Ron and Hermione rushed forward to help.”

blog.name: lovelydelightfulpeach
blog.title: Writing and Reading
blog.description: This is an inspo blog for the novel i'm working on as well as where I document what I am currently reading. :)

summary: It’s Time.
title: It’s Time.
body:
So, confession time. I am an avid reader sure I have my moments were I will go months having only read one book or I will read a book or two a week. Lately, I have been on a huge reading kick going through my TBR almost as fast as I can add to it. 

With that being said. There is one beast on my TBR I have been meaning to tackle since elementary school. Which means there is no time like the present aka my Junior year of college. Okay, so maybe this is over a decade in the making but it’s fine. I’ve just realized that I’ve rambled this whole time and forgotten to mention that said beast is none other than the Harry Potter series. 

After I finish each book I will be coming over here to document my unfiltered opinion. Will I finally make it through all the books? Will my mom put up with me asking her to mail me the next ones? Will I finish this task before the New Year? Stay tuned to find out. 


P.S. I have no idea why I’m writing like someone other than myself is actually going to read this.

summary:
blaise: 
draco, we think you should just ask harry out. for our-your sanity.
pansy:
we really think you should, we’re kind of...
body:
blaise:

draco, we think you should just ask harry out. for our-your sanity.

pansy:

we really think you should, we’re kind of tired of hearing you talk about him all the time!

draco:

okay so how do you suggest I do that, get on my knees and say, “oh, sorry we were on opposite sides of a war and I nearly killed a few of your friends, but can I take you on a date?”

pansy:

well, that would be a nice conversation opener.

summary: “Oh, these people's minds work in strange ways, Petunia, they're not like you and me," said Uncle Vernon, trying to knock in a...
body:
“Oh, these people’s minds work in strange ways, Petunia, they’re not like you and me,“ said Uncle Vernon, trying to knock in a nail with the piece of fruitcake Aunt Petunia had just brought him

- Harry Potter and the Philosopher‘s Stone

summary:
The Chess Game And we are the ones that want to choose 
Always want to play, but you never want to lose 
System Of a Down....
caption:
The Chess Game

And we are the ones that want to choose
Always want to play, but you never want to lose
 System Of a Down. Aerials

I’ve wanted to draw this picture since I started to read the Harry Potter’s books and now I’ve had done this.

At the Winter Fandom Combat 2017 I did series of monochrome pictures about the chess and the game of these both characters. In this picture I continued that idea more concrete. I wanted to show existence of them which is full of throws, monitoring, surveillance, analysis and of course risk, danger and surprises.

Rowling showed in first book (for example when Harry, Ron, Hermione played the magic chess) how complicated and difficult the game could be. When you are playing with live creatures, it can be clear and simple in the idea and plan but it’s difficult in real life. You need to feel balance and you aren’t at the top always. You have a lot of unexpected moments. Everything is changing.

I want to show in my art this moment of game. And many skulls in the cupboard demonstrate how it is complicated.

Tom really loves challenges. He likes to walk along the edges, always finding something new. He has mistaken too but he studies and analyzes, he has obsessive to his purpose and he finds the way into. Tom has experiments and he takes a good position one way or another.

Albus, with his great experience power and plans, will mistake and fail one day.

The more interesting and unexpected the game for them both is. And they both prefer to risk, bravery and cunning. It’s something from fate even if you have sharp brains and great power. It doesn’t matter how good you are playing. You are dissolving in process.

Tom and Albus are similar in some moments. They both have long fingers, tall and thin bodies, even poses at the table. One is like mirror for another. They always spying one after another, playing in one deck of cards. It’s always connecting between Tom and Albus.

They have many skulls beside the chess table. Albus feels grieve about victims of that game but he never stops. He has to continue the game. Even Tom feel bad about victims when ghosts of his murders came and stay around him.

It doesn’t matter who is the winner of that game. The feeling of this sharp, difficult, dangerous but really interesting connection is value by itself and it takes all time that they have.

reblog.comment:
The Chess Game

And we are the ones that want to choose
Always want to play, but you never want to lose
 System Of a Down. Aerials

summary:
My MC found him in a library but... 
He begin to ignore Rowan. Jeez, that's cold 
I'm really sorry about that, Rowan. My MC...
body:
When you choose “Forget Rowan”

My MC found him in a library but…

He begin to ignore Rowan. Jeez, that’s cold

I’m really sorry about that, Rowan. My MC didn’t mean it.

Yeah, you’re right, Penny. I was supposed to choose “I’ll talk to Rowan”

blog.name: accio-shitpost
blog.title: shitpost managed
blog.description:
FAQ

unforgivably cursing you with our existence since 1965

as seen in Bo Burnham's Eighth Grade, apparently

we have a Discord server! join here! (15+ only please)

we track the tag 'accioshitpost' (without a dash) so if you have art or a fic based on of one of our posts, pop it in there and we'll reblog it for you! we always appreciate your creativity!

you can find our amazon wishlists here and here - if you get us anything, we'll post a picture and a thank you note!!

if you want to follow our personal blogs, here's Roxie's, here's Persephone's, and here's Jamie's

nazis, terfs, pedos, and anybody happy to defend or stand by them can leave. we don't want you. avada kedavra, shithead.

now in blue raspberry flavours, hitting stores soon!

summary: as corruption, distrust, and blatant hate begins to infect every facet of the ministry, lord voldemort and his death eaters...
caption:
as corruption, distrust, and blatant hate begins to infect every facet of the ministry, lord voldemort and his death eaters finally begin to believe one simple fact.

they have won.

noyade is a marauders era roleplay. we are brand new and looking for you to join our vibrant community of creators! we are currently hosting our first event, so don’t miss it!

INDEX / RULES / PLOT / CANON LIST / FAQ

blog.description: Any Pronouns // bisexual // GNC // white // mostly shitpost, occasional sanders sides, The Adventure zone/Mcelroys, my hero acedmia, minecraft, ADHD, and a few others // become the monster // Radfems, Transmeds, Ace exlusionists, and any form of exclusionary are NOT allowed to interact with me in anyway // warning - i can get political and if that aint your jam i wouldnt suggest following me // art blog @b-atiful-art

tags: i dont blog about hp alot i dont know how to tag this
i just dont like him ok sjhdkshs
free me my snape appreciating prison before i actually start liking him
summary: I accidentally followed a snape stan blog and now im seeing very well written arguments as to why Snape isnt shit on my blog and...
body:
I accidentally followed a snape stan blog and now im seeing very well written arguments as to why Snape isnt shit on my blog and i wont fucking stand for it.

Im starting to tolerate him and I dont like it. HES A SLIMY BOY! A SLIMY BOY WHO ABUSES CHILDREN!!
